description.narrative: COs and partners are supported by ROSA to improve maternal, new-born, child and adolescent health in South Asia to deliver high quality immunisation services that eliminate vaccine-preventable illnesses, including polio., which contributes to Immunization, Skills Development, Technical Excellence In Policy And Programmes, Technical Excellence In Policy And Programmes (Covid). UNICEF aims to achieve this through Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Comprehensive, sustainable and enabling environment that leaves no child behind is supported by policies, programmes, strategies, budgets and actions of Governments, regional institutions, private sector, media, financial institutions, UN and UNICEF country programmes in South Asia, in development and humanitarian contexts.

THE ROYAL INSTITUTE OF INTERNATIONA AFFAIRS CHATHAM HOUSE

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: COs and partners are supported by ROSA to improve maternal, new-born, child and adolescent health in South Asia to deliver high quality immunisation services that eliminate vaccine-preventable illnesses, including polio.

description.narrative: Ensure effective engagement in teaching and application of latest global methodologies for understanding and addressing coverage and equity gaps and strengthen country capacity on demand generation for immunization and sustainable supply chain. Impart technical backstopping to the countries on COVID-19 response activities followed by the catch up and reestablishment of equity centered immunization services at primary health care level through community health system strengthening. Lead integrated service delivery within the polio-hub, provide community-based vaccination review, transformation trainings, capacity building, Technical Advisory Group and cross border meeting preparation and implementations to stop WPV and cVDPV circulation. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:03/08/2020
